summary: Everything felt fine... Until It Didn't
title: Everything felt fine... Until It Didn't
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HHJAZ4

by Groot_Is_God

Peter shrugged again. He didn’t feel bad persay, but on the scale from horrible to terrific he was definitely somewhere on the ehh side, below ok but above bad. He felt desire to curl up into a ball and just not move for a while.

Words: 1470, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of More than Survive

blog.name: pepperony3000
blog.title: ⎊All I ask is a tall ship and a star to steer her by⎊
blog.description: T'Nara, officially the female incarnation of Tony Stark, lover of Star Trek, MCU, DCEU, ATLA, and a variety of other random things. If you ship St*rker or Th*rki or any other nasty p*do or inc*st ship (what is this world coming to that I have to say that???) then get off my blog. Officially anti steve rogers now. Drat. Did not want.

question: FMK Tony Rhodey Pepper
answer:
Are you actively TRYING to hurt me???

Fuck Pepper, because I REALLY wanna know what she whispered in Tony’s ear in the first Avengers movie.

Marry Rhodey because he’s such husband material and I will always be bitter that they did him dirty and cast a much-too-young 25-year-old to play the person he’s supposed to have an iconic romance with.

Kill Tony, because he’s already dead and the decision has been taken out of my hands already.

(I hate you btw)

Please talk to me about anything and I’ll love you forever! <3

reblog.comment:

Please talk to me about anything and I’ll love you forever! <3

title: Still Here
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2wcVvJ2

by Foxglove_Fiction

Avengers: Endgame Spoilers; Fic is Avengers Endgame compliant!

 

It’s never easy to lose a loved one. It’s even harder to lose a loved one you’ve spent lifetimes with, while never being able to express the extent of your feelings.

Words: 2463, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Doctor Strange (2016), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

summary:
WHY AM I ONLY SEEING THIS NOW ?
I don't know if jake using the "love u 3000" thing is the cutest thing i've seen or if it hurts...
body:
WHY AM I ONLY SEEING THIS NOW ?

I don’t know if jake using the “love u 3000” thing is the cutest thing i’ve seen or if it hurts my feelings really bad. probably both.

i love them.

blog.name: hedgehog-goulash7
blog.title: Hedgehog Goulash
blog.description: Southern California is my home.  Writer, artist, traveler, pop culture fan, Robert Downey Jr., RDJ's Sherlock Holmes, The Avengers, books of all sorts, cat aficionado, and all things travel-related. This Tumblr is mostly my pop culture favorites, plus random cool stuff I find or create.  Welcome!

summary: Tony Stark: *dies*  Anti-Tony dimwits: “Ha ha he’s gone now”  Tony stans: “Ha ha that makes him even MORE attractive and now we...
body:
Tony Stark: *dies*

Anti-Tony dimwits: “Ha ha he’s gone now”

Tony stans: “Ha ha that makes him even MORE attractive and now we love him 3000 times more that he’s totally vindicated and is Forever, Canonically the Best and Bravest Avenger, Savior of All Life in the Universe.”

*commence flood of fanfic and art, now ranging from Coffee Shop AUs to Afterlife AUs*

reblog.comment:

Tony stans: “Ha ha that makes him even MORE attractive and now we love him 3000 times more that he’s totally vindicated and is Forever, Canonically the Best and Bravest Avenger, Savior of All Life in the Universe.”

*commence flood of fanfic and art, now ranging from Coffee Shop AUs to Afterlife AUs*

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: it’s a thin line (between love and hate)
title: it’s a thin line (between love and hate)
body:
by WillowsAndWastelands

Steve and Tony hate everything about each other. They would swear it on everything they own.

But if that’s so true, then why the hell can’t they live without one another?

Or, alternatively titled, how these two dumbasses realized they were so, so wrong. And how they kind-of, sort-of, most definitely fell in love along the way.

Words: 3010, Chapters: 1/5, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Iron Man (Movies), Captain America - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Thor (Marvel), Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Mutual Pining, Angst, Angst with a Happy Ending, Hurt/Comfort, We Love Our Dumbasses!, Slow Burn, Feelings Realization


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/18913324

But if that’s so true, then why the hell can’t they live without one another?

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: In Your Eyes (Universes are Made and Unmade)
title: In Your Eyes (Universes are Made and Unmade)
body:
by avengertonys

“Big man in a suit of armour. Take that off, what are you?”

It was a fair question. Tony Stark had carefully cultivated the image that he showed the world, had constructed his façade piece by piece over the years until it could be considered its own kind of protection. Few people had ever seen the real Tony, and fewer people still were ever allowed to know him. It was a defence mechanism, a way of keeping himself safe from the threats that the outside world presented.

He’d flown far too close to the sun before, knew that allowing himself the luxury of company would only end in a crash, in the water working its way into his lungs. Choking, choking, choking.

So, when he finds himself lost amongst the stars, he expects this to be the end. His life will end not in water but in darkness.

The stars have other plans.

For under the armour, Tony Stark is not a genius, billionaire, playboy philanthropist.

Under the armour, Tony Stark is human.

Under the armour, Tony Stark is fragile.

Under the armour, Tony Stark is the universe.

Words: 1723, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Lessons from the Cosmos

ravenclaw//thunderbird

she/her//bi

tags: ive been thinking about this for WEEKS
summary: Bruce and Tony saw Nat when they snapped.
body:
Bruce and Tony saw Nat when they snapped.

Thanos snaps and sees Gamora; but not the Gamora he sacrificed. He saw the little girl he “cared for” and “saved.”

Bruce snaps - successfully brings everyone back. And he gets to see Nat. Not the Nat that sacrificed her life on Vormir so her family could live - he sees the Nat he fell in love with (aou nat.) She’s behind a bar, making drinks, cracking jokes, “Fancy seeing you here, Banner,” and they talk for a moment before Bruce is pulled back to reality.

Tony snaps - he saves everyone. And it’s all thanks to Nat. So when he snaps, he sees Natasha flippin Romanoff. The woman who successfully tricked him into believing she was just an assistant who could throw a pretty good punch, long red curly hair vibrant against the orange background of the soul stone. And she yells at Tony because “Damnit Stark, I died so none of you would have to.” “Come on, Romanoff you know how I am.”

and then he’s back to reality, taking in goodbyes and last breaths before he sees her again - and Nat’s waiting there for him. And Tony sees her and she walks up to him, wiping away stray tears; she looks almost exactly how she was before they all split up for the Time Heist, except she’s wearing casual clothes. Tony looks down, and so is he.

“Looks like you’re stuck with me for forever.”

“Looks like it.”

title: It's All For You
body:

by KitFangirls

Tony Stark never really wanted a kid. He was a disaster, and thought most people wouldn’t consider him a fit parent. Apparently Mary Parker did, because now Tony is standing there with a kid in his arms.

Peter Parker is Tony’s biological kid
